meanings.sent1: The knobbier surface of the rock made it difficult to climb.
meanings.sent2: The tree with the knobbier branches provided more shade.
meanings.sent3: The knobbier door handle kept slipping from my grip!
meanings.sent4: Her knobbier necklace stood out among the delicate jewelry.
meanings.sent5: The knobbier texture of the fabric felt rough against my skin.

meanings.sent1: The knobbier tree trunk was easier to climb than the smooth one.
meanings.sent2: Her knobbier gloves kept her hands warmer in the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The knobbier potato in the bag looked like a tiny alien!
meanings.sent4: The knobbier road ahead seemed full of unexpected bumps.
meanings.sent5: The knobbier handle on the mug made it easier to grip.
